# Scrubber.ScrubLots method

Scrubs lots for an account.

```csharp
public static void ScrubLots(Account acct, bool treeWise = false)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| acct | Account to scrub. |
| treeWise | true to scrub the entire account tree, false to just scrube this account. |
